title: Beach Property for Sale in Tangalle with Magnificent Views
details: We are pleased to offer yet another prime beach front site ripe for development! 6 acres of first line beach front land that backs onto good road access yet well away from the noise pollution of the main roads. Well elevated and offering fabulous views across the Indian Ocean this prime beach front property is being offered at a very reasonable price considering its proximity to Tangalle and Hambantota, its attractive elevated topography and its connections to power and mains water supply.
